CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(funding_method_selected__c), 0, IF( OR( Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "1", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "2", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "3", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "4", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "5", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "6", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "7", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "8", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "9", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "10", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "11", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "12", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "13", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "18" ), full_ntf_amount__c - total_additional_beneficiary_amount__c - IF( effective_date__c < Golive_Date__c, 0, Accrued_Interest__c) , IF( OR( Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "14", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "15", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "16", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "17" ), Loan_Information__r.NTF_Pengajuan__c, IF( AND(OR( Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "19", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "20", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "21", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "22", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "23", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "24" ), Loan_Information__r.Survey__r.Perpanjangan_PRK__c == TRUE), Loan_Information__r.NTF_Pengajuan__c, IF( OR( Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "19", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "20", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "21", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "22", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "23", Application__r.Survey__r.Product_Offering__c = "24" ), full_ntf_amount__c - total_additional_beneficiary_amount__c, 0 ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Funding Amount
